title: Bloomberg Markets: Veronese on `Devastating' Wildfires
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Veronese on `Devastating' Wildfires
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Toni Veronese\u0010Owner\u0010Aventine Hospitality\u0010Discussing the impact of wildfires in Northern California and the restaurant business providing food for victims.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
